data.title: Releases Â· scala-network/Scala
data.meta_description: Distributed wealth for all devices. . Contribute to scala-network/Scala development by creating an account on GitHub.
data.text:
Scala v7.9.3 is a preliminary release that comes prior to the upcoming V8 fork.

This release in particular includes:

Nodes and checkpoints needed to connect to the public testnet

Scala v7.9.2 is a preliminary release that comes prior to the upcoming V8 fork.

This release in particular includes:

Fixes to ring signature code that caused some transactions to not be sent

Scala v7.9.1 is a preliminary release that comes prior to the upcoming V8 fork.

This release in particular includes:

Fixes to diardi code

Scala v7.9.0 is a preliminary release that comes prior to the upcoming V8 fork. This release was made to address the confusions that arose from having multiple repo's and fragmented codebases.

This release in particular includes:

Diardi V2 code for staging and test networks

Updated seed node list

Updated checkpoint mechanism using the IPFS network

A lot of bug fixes

An update from v4.1.0 is technically not necessary, but is very highly recommended.
